author: stsp
msg: In mod_dav_svn, destroy an iterpool before returning error.
(do_walk): Destroy the iterpool created here before returning an error.

author: burn
msg: UIMA-4110 Fix tests to not depend on other projects being built

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r1643810, only update the operational log state for the
root of the recursion. This avoids leaking a tiny bit of memory for every
(do_walk): Add walk_root variable and use it to avoid changing per request
operational log state for every node (while growing memory usage).

author: markt
msg: Update fork of Apache Commons Pool2 to latest trunk to pick up fixes including one for a potential infinite loop.
